Class org.eclipse.ohf.ihe.xds.metadata.extract.FileSubmissionSetExtractor. Method : public SubmissionSetType extract() throws MetadataExtractionException 
Line 71: String xmlString = null; 
Line 103: resource.load(new ByteArrayInputStream(xmlString.getBytes()), null); 

No where is the string initialized. I was running the test case org.eclipse.ohf.ihe.xds.source.test.SubmitTest and saw this bug.  

The error stack is listed below.
